verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: vegetable beef stew] here a great beef stew that simmers in a wonderful gravy served with a loaf of crusty bread and a green salad it a tasty meal for grown - ups and kids alike i think it even better the next day -randee eckstein commack new york brown
